title.text: The FINITE STRING Newsletter Site Report Site Report Computational Linguistics at BBN Labs

entities.text: FINITE STRING Newsletter Site Report Site Report Computational Linguistics

abstractContent.text: Our research has three chief goals: to handle connected discourse instead of sentences in isolation, to discover the intentions behind discourse as well as its literal meaning, and to handle failures (by the program or its user) gracefully.
To achieve these we must make progress in other areas-planning and knowledge representation.
I will survey our work in computational linguistics and then consider the supporting efforts in related areas of AI.
